Name: pilot_blacksteel
Description: Blacksteel, officially Blacksteel Worldwide and also known as BS or BSW for short, is a Columbia-based private military company/contractor (PMC). Blacksteel used their newly acquired intel to contact the lesser-known Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals and arranged on-site treatment for their specialists while seizing the opportunity to reach several agreements with the company. Currently Blacksteel is under contract to provide professional security and other consulting services to the R.I., and also offers operator exchange programs.
